title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message:
The device is extremely dusty and runny. The customer said that the screen did not come after doing the Recovery.
It draws 1.61 amps without the battery. The fan is spinning, no boot sound, no picture. Is it possible that the amd graphics card is faulty?

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message:
I suppose you have 00928 board on the desk.

Failing software upgrade can cause BIOS corruption.
Try known good full BIOS, with clean ME.

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message: I tried me bios and different bios. I tried a total of 2 bios But the same fan is spinning again, no sound, no picture 1.37 Amps

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message:
Always test USB activity, apart of internal video and chime.

Did it fail in recovery process, or stopped to work after recovery was completed (next reboot)?
Was there a macOS upgrade involved?

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message:
It shows 5 volts on the usb, but when I insert the flash disk, I noticed that the green light on it does not come on.

I just know it didn't come after recovery

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message:
L7211/21/31/30   LA640/50/350 these coils have 1 volt 

L7410/ 20  NO Voltage

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message:
CPU core should drop from 1V to 0.6V aprox, when board really boots.

Clean ME of original BIOS will not help; as corruption is expected on the pure BIOS section, not on ME.
Where did you get another full BIOS?
Board should boot even with dirty ME, like dump read from other similar board.
Clean ME must be done at the end.

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message: bios dosyasını vinafix'ten aldım. varsa gönderebilirmisin

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message: I got the bios file from vinafix. Can you send if you have

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message:
I tried 5 different bios. Currently there is no voltage on the LA640. If there is no voltage here, does the opening sound normally come?
do these coils have anything to do with the u9850?

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message:
I tried 5 different bios. Currently there is no voltage on the LA640. If there is no voltage here, does the opening sound come out under normal conditions?
do these coils have anything to do with the u9850?

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message:
LAx colis are GPU related.
Do not expect voltage on L7410/20; it appears only under high load graphics.

Try this BIOS and comment:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YKKdpd0DtpobU8OOCfcS21hrKN10yTUH/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message: I tried old bios and different bios. now it stays at 0.02 amps and won't turn on. I did nothing but write bios. now it won't open again on the original bios file 0.02😩

title: A1707 820-00928-A No Sound No image
message: Something reacts to heat; probably CPU has internal problems.
